positions.subtitle: Navi
positions.description: Leading the Investments charter at Navi, driving strategy to increase daily inflows & retention for Mutual Fund & Digital Gold products-Built the Fastest Sell Experience in the Mutual Fund Industry in India using IMPS rails- Removed backloaders entirely in the post-purchase journey using smart & sequential data prefetch- Introduced an Innovative flow enabling investments before KYC to reduce user friction while onboarding- Launched the 'Reverse Penny Drop' flow for bank verification with a simple ₹1 UPI transaction - Enhanced the UPI Autopay flow for SIP by implementing same-day settlement-Launched the 'Orders in Progress' section on landing pages using UX research insights to ease user anxiety over delayed portfolio updates due to the T+1 allotment cycle
positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Leading the Investments charter at Navi, driving strategy to increase daily inflows & retention for Mutual Fund & Digital Gold products
-Built the Fastest Sell Experience in the Mutual Fund Industry in India using IMPS rails
- Removed backloaders entirely in the post-purchase journey using smart & sequential data prefetch
- Introduced an Innovative flow enabling investments before KYC to reduce user friction while onboarding
- Launched the 'Reverse Penny Drop' flow for bank verification with a simple ₹1 UPI transaction
- Enhanced the UPI Autopay flow for SIP by implementing same-day settlement
-Launched the 'Orders in Progress' section on landing pages using UX research insights to ease user anxiety over delayed portfolio updates due to the T+1 allotment cycle

positions.subtitle: Navi
positions.description: Designed and implemented the complete end-to-end Mutual Fund investment flow from scratch within the Navi app- Launched mutual fund flow in the Navi app within 4 months, integrating- Built the shortest KYC flow in the MF Industry for existing users, reducing the journey to just 4 steps - Developed a flow for providing same-day NAV on investments made up to 3 PM, surpassing the industry standard of 2 PM- Enabled users to immediately view their existing portfolio right after login by using their mobile number - Launched 'Manual SIP,' an industry-first feature enabling users to set up SIPs without an eNACH mandate, avoiding bounce charges by allowing manual payments on the due date
positions.title: Associate Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Designed and implemented the complete end-to-end Mutual Fund investment flow from scratch within the Navi app
- Launched mutual fund flow in the Navi app within 4 months, integrating
- Built the shortest KYC flow in the MF Industry for existing users, reducing the journey to just 4 steps
- Developed a flow for providing same-day NAV on investments made up to 3 PM, surpassing the industry standard of 2 PM
- Enabled users to immediately view their existing portfolio right after login by using their mobile number
- Launched 'Manual SIP,' an industry-first feature enabling users to set up SIPs without an eNACH mandate, avoiding bounce charges by allowing manual payments on the due date

positions.subtitle: Zilingo
positions.description: Drive Product development, prioritization, and adoption for the B2B Marketplace vertical of Zilingo. Some of my works include:- RFQ feature for users to submit customized orders, receive bids, and chat with suppliers- Checkout flow improvements in the cart and payment page to increase in conversion rate- Credit feature to allow sellers to extend credit to their premium buyers - Seller KYC feature to reduce the time required for onboarding and verifying new Sellers- Personalised section on Home Page for users to solve for abandoned carts and pending payments
positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Drive Product development, prioritization, and adoption for the B2B Marketplace vertical of Zilingo. Some of my works include:
- RFQ feature for users to submit customized orders, receive bids, and chat with suppliers
- Checkout flow improvements in the cart and payment page to increase in conversion rate
- Credit feature to allow sellers to extend credit to their premium buyers
- Seller KYC feature to reduce the time required for onboarding and verifying new Sellers
- Personalised section on Home Page for users to solve for abandoned carts and pending payments

positions.subtitle: Zilingo
positions.description: Co-Led product initiatives for the B2B Ecommerce Vertical of Ziingo. Some of the products I have worked on:- Private Catalogs feature for selling exclusive products to premium buyers- Invoice Discounting feature for sellers to avail of loans from lenders and offer free credit to Buyers- Automation of Tax Invoice collection process- Collaborated with Design, Marketing, and Production teams to create corporate videos and campaigns - End to End digitization of a Direct Selling Network with 25+ Distributors
positions.title: Associate Product Manager
positions.description_html:
Co-Led product initiatives for the B2B Ecommerce Vertical of Ziingo. Some of the products I have worked on:
- Private Catalogs feature for selling exclusive products to premium buyers
- Invoice Discounting feature for sellers to avail of loans from lenders and offer free credit to Buyers
- Automation of Tax Invoice collection process
- Collaborated with Design, Marketing, and Production teams to create corporate videos and campaigns
- End to End digitization of a Direct Selling Network with 25+ Distributors
